description.text: Enjoy a personalized service in a modern hotel as Crowne Plaza Madrid Airport. During a trip whether for pleasure or business, our hotel offers a courtesy shuttle transfer from the airport. Step into a designed and funtional room, experience attentive and personalized service, first class amenities. Enjoy free welcome drinks at the minibar on the first day. When you need to work, our 24 hours Business Center is open. Free WiFi avalaible for all guests.  Meeting rooms full equiped The best option in the airport is also nearby from work and leisure. In the proximity of the main companies as  Iveco, Fiat company and Airbus, Eads Casa and connected easily with Parque Empresarial San Fernando, Aena. For leisure, close Shopping Center Plenilunio. 20 minutes driving to Dowtown.
